product_name: Chasin' RabbitsBunny Line Smoother Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSmooth away fine lines and plump tired eyes with Chasin’ Rabbits Bunny Line Smoother—a top K-Beauty eye cream. Powered by brightening niacinamide and plumping hyaluronic acid, this targeted formula helps instantly de-puff with a cooling metal applicator.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly smooths fine lines and wrinklesBrightens dark circles under the eyesPlumps skin with lasting moistureLightweight texture absorbs quicklyPerfect for all skin types, including sensitiveKey IngredientsNiacinamide: Illuminates dark under-eyesPomegranate Fruit Ferment: Brightens and smooths skin textureLactobacillus Ferment: Minimizes redness and irritationHyaluronic Acid – Deeply hydrates and plumps skinPanthenol (Vitamin B5) – Soothes and repairs skin barrierAdenosine – Helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles and smooth textureItem 2644839How To UseGently massage desired skin areas while applying the cream.IngredientsAcrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Carbomer, Betaine, Panthenol, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Adenosine, Propanediol, Sodium Phytate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta-Glucan, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Hyaluronic Acid.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently massage desired skin areas while applying the cream.

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have super sensitive skin and most eye products irritate me but this one didnt. Its a lot bigger than I expected

reviews.headline: moistutizing
reviews.comments: I have really sensitive eyes and this does not irritate them. its esencially just more moisurizer for your eyes but its very portable and I love that. now I can take it to work and when my eyes start to get more dried out I just put some of this under them and bam! would definitely recommend this to everyone. especially dry girlies like me!
